intro.title: Welcome to Subtraction Fun!
intro.narration: Hello, friends! Today, we are going to dive into the exciting world of subtraction. Are you ready to learn how to take away? Let’s start with a simple problem: 9 minus 4!

explanation.title: Understanding 9 - 4
explanation.narration: Alright! When we say 9 minus 4, we are trying to find out how many we have left after taking 4 away from 9. Imagine you have 9 apples. If you give away 4 apples to your friends, let’s find out how many apples you have left. Let’s count together! 9 apples take away 4 apples equals 5 apples. So, 9 minus 4 is 5!

practice_mcq.title: Let’s Practice Together!
practice_mcq.question: What is 9 - 4?
practice_mcq.explanation: Great job! The answer is 5 because when you take away 4 from 9, you have 5 left. Keep practicing and you’ll become a subtraction superstar!

summary.title: You Did It!
summary.narration: Fantastic work today! We learned how to subtract and found that 9 minus 4 equals 5. Remember, subtraction is all about taking away. Keep practicing, and subtraction will be a piece of cake!
